tool_description: Plagiarism remover uses an advanced machine learning algorithm to replace words and phrases in your text to make it unique
name: Plagiarism Remover
title: Plagiarism Remover

api_list.name: Rewrite
api_list.description: This endpoint automatically rewrites sentences, phrases or paragraphs and removes plagiarised material.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://plagiarism-remover.p.rapidapi.com/api/rewrite"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "plagiarism-remover.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://plagiarism-remover.p.rapidapi.com/api/rewrite"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "plagiarism-remover.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
